title: No rule "install" in makefile
body:
Hello, thank you for your work.

In the README.md, you tell to follow install instructions from IOKernelRW.
In their installation procedure, they suggest to use `make install`to install the kext, but here, there is no Ã¬nstall` rule in the Makefile.

Best regards.
author: alexandredoyen29

comments.body: I have no idea where that went, sorry! It was definitely there before - I must have accidentally removed it. You can instead manually install it by running `sudo cp -R KextRW.kext /Library/Extensions`.

satisfaction_conditions: An alternative method to install the kext when the make install command is unavailable
Clear instructions that can be executed to install the kext
Information that addresses the discrepancy between the README and the actual Makefile
